languages.text: {n}Мертвецы продолжают идти — все ближе, и ближе, и... ваши пальцы практически против вашего желания сжимаются на осколке, впивающемся в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мертвецы продолжают идти — все ближе, и ближе, и... ваши пальцы практически против вашего желания сжимаются на осколке, впивающемся в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The dead only draw closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge cutting into your palm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мертвецы продолжают идти — все ближе, и ближе, и... ваши пальцы практически против вашего желания сжимаются на осколке, впивающемся в вашу ладонь острым краем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Nearly against your will, your fingers tighten around the shard biting into your palm with a sharp edge.{/n}
{n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Nearly against your will, your fingers tighten around the shard biting into your palm with a sharp edge.{/n}
{n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge biting into your palm.{/n}
{n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge biting into your palm.{/n}
{n}The dead only draw closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge cutting into your palm.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些死者却不断靠近，越来越近，越来越近……你的手指不由自主地握紧了碎片，它锋利的边缘咬住了你的手掌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead only draw closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge cutting into your palm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些死者却不断靠近，越来越近，越来越近……你的手指不由自主地握紧了碎片，它锋利的边缘咬住了你的手掌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les morts continuent d'approcher pas à pas, inexorablement... Vos doigts se crispent involontairement sur le fragment acéré qui vous déchire la peau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge biting into your palm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les morts continuent d'approcher pas à pas, inexorablement... Vos doigts se crispent involontairement sur le fragment acéré qui vous déchire la peau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}死体はなおも近づいてくる…指は無意識のうちに欠片を握りしめ、その鋭い先端が手のひらに食い込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead only draw closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge cutting into your palm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死体はなおも近づいてくる…指は無意識のうちに欠片を握りしめ、その鋭い先端が手のひらに食い込む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los muertos se acercan cada vez más, y... tus dedos se cierran involuntariamente en torno al fragmento, cuyo borde afilado se clava en tu palma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead only draw closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge cutting into your palm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los muertos se acercan cada vez más, y... tus dedos se cierran involuntariamente en torno al fragmento, cuyo borde afilado se clava en tu palma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Toten bedrängen dich immer mehr, kommen näher und näher und ... Deine Finger schließen sich unwillkürlich um den Splitter, dessen scharfe Kante sich in deine Handfläche beißt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead keep approaching, closer, and closer, and... Your fingers involuntarily tighten around the shard, its sharp edge biting into your palm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Toten bedrängen dich immer mehr, kommen näher und näher und ... Deine Finger schließen sich unwillkürlich um den Splitter, dessen scharfe Kante sich in deine Handfläche beißt.{/n}
